resources.string: You have 5 guesses to find the number we\'re seeking (1-10).\nEnter your number and click \"Enter Number\", if your guess is higher than the target number you should try with a lower number and vice versa.\nGood luck!

You have 7 guesses to find the number we\'re seeking (1-100).\nEnter your number and click \"Enter Number\", if your guess is higher than the target number you should try with a lower number and vice versa.\nGood luck!

You have 10 guesses to find the number we\'re seeking (1-1000).\nEnter your number and click \"Enter Number\", if your guess is higher than the target number you should try with a lower number and vice versa.\nGood luck!
Oops, something went wrong. Hit the back button and try again
